name: The Rite of Ammon
description:
It was supposed to be a normal B&E call for the abandoned warehouse. Probably some damn teenagers again. But you end up stumbling upon something you probably shouldn't have.

Play through 3 unique gameplay scenarios and escape the cultists in this short PS1 style horror game made for the Haunted PS1 Summer 2021 game jam.

Controls

Mouse - Look

WASD - Move

Left mouse - Interact

Arrow Keys - Press Simon buttons (first room)

Space - Swim up (while swimming)

Esc/Tab - Menu

HELP, MY CURSOR ISN'T LOCKED

Press tab, click resume, and click again.

Everything else - Me (Vykri)
